TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1236

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1236

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Price List*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*John Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*To *person_mentioned*W. Buford*/person_mentioned* Dr.*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1825">1825*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="10-26-1825">Octor 26th*/date_mentioned*. To 1 Sett Knives and forks______________________ $4. 50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-21-1825">Novr. 21st*/date_mentioned*. 2 Doz Suspender buttons @ 12 1/2______________________ 25*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-05-1825">Nov. 5th*/date_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*J. E. B. Austin*/person_mentioned* To *person_mentioned*W. Buford*/person_mentioned* Dr.*/p*
*p*To 4 Yds Brown Linen @ 75_________________________ 3.*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-12-1825">12th*/date_mentioned* To 4 Do Do __ Do___________________________________ 3.*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-28-1825">28th */date_mentioned**person_mentioned*Col Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*1 Dressd Buckskin_________________________ 1.50*/p*
*p*$12. 25*/p* *p*Recd payment *person_mentioned*W. Buford*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
